org.gicentre.utils.network.traer.physics
Class ForwardEulerIntegrator

java.lang.Object
  org.gicentre.utils.network.traer.physics.Integrator
      org.gicentre.utils.network.traer.physics.ForwardEulerIntegrator

public class ForwardEulerIntegrator
extends Integrator

Class capable of performing forward Euler integration. Compared to the Runge-Kutta integrator, this one is faster, but can be less stable.

Author:
Carl Pearson, Jeffrey Traer Bernstein and minor modifications by Jo Wood.
